list.headline: Hi There!
list.rightTextBlock: We wanted to show you DnCreate's main features

list.headline: Complete Character Sheet
list.leftTextBlock: DnCreate offers a full character sheet that updates as you go, level up gaining more abilities and features all explained into detail for new and veteran players alike.
list.rightTextBlock: With multiple systems like items, wearable equipment, full spellbook and much more.

list.headline: Adventure System
list.leftTextBlock: DnCreate allows you to band with your friends under your DM as a party.
list.rightTextBlock: Your DM will be able to access the party members character sheets and view all the different stats you have.

list.headline: Quest System
list.leftTextBlock: Coming with the adventure system, the quest system allows the DM to issue party quests for all the banding adventurers.
list.rightTextBlock: Once the DM issues a quest, every party member will be able to view it's details and track it.

list.headline: New Features
list.leftTextBlock: We are always thinking of ways to improve DnCreate
list.rightTextBlock: The app updates regularly, and you should expect tons of new exiting content
